data.eml:eml: Archaeoteleia Masner in the Cretaceous and a new species of Proteroscelio Brues (Hymenoptera, Platygastroidea)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Talamas, Elijah J., Johnson, Norman F., Buffington, Matthew L., Ren, Dong (2016): Archaeoteleia Masner in the Cretaceous and a new species of Proteroscelio Brues (Hymenoptera, Platygastroidea). Journal of Hymenoptera Research 56: 241-261, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/jhr.56.10388, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/jhr.56.10388
